item.title: iCoreConnect Inc 10-K
item.description: iCoreConnect Inc, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 18, 2022 had 21496 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 449 instances stock - 241 instances financial - 203 instances 2021 - 193 instances december - 184 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
